snippet: After Sunday’s play at the Second World Mind Sports Games, the qualifying stage was just over half completed.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during the Second World Mind Sports Games in Lille, France.
lead_paragraph: After Sunday’s play at the Second World Mind Sports Games, the qualifying stage was just over half completed.
